data.partBlankContent: Stu is turning sixteen this year. He as___ for a car f__ his birt____, b__ he doesn't think th__ he wi__ get i_. But h_ doesn't kn__ that h__ parents ha__ already wri____ him a check f__ two thou____ dollars. He can use it on a car or on something else he wants.
data.fullContent: Stu is turning sixteen this year. He asked for a car for his birthday, but he doesn't think that he will get it. But he doesn't know that his parents have already written him a check for two thousand dollars. He can use it on a car or on something else he wants.
data.answer: 斯图今年满16岁了。他要求一辆车作为生日礼物，但他认为他得不到。但是他不知道他的父母已经给他开了一张2000美元的支票。他可以用在汽车上或者其他他想要的东西上。
